## Tool Information

**Repository URL:** 
https://github.com/owner/repo

**Tool Type:** 
- [ ] Skill (has SKILL.md)
- [ ] Plugin (has .claude-plugin)
- [ ] Collection (multiple skills)
- [ ] CLI Tool
- [ ] MCP Server
- [ ] Prompt Pack
- [ ] Workflow
- [ ] Extension
- [ ] Resource/Documentation

**Description:**
Brief description of what the tool does.

## Checklist
- [ ] Repository is public
- [ ] Has clear documentation
- [ ] Related to Claude Code ecosystem
